mapper.select: SELECT sa_name, b_no, b_title, b_id, dbday, b_hit, num FROM (SELECT b_no, b_title, b_id, To_char(b_date,'YYYY-MM-DD')as dbday , b_hit, rownum as num FROM (SELECT b_no, b_title, b_id, b_date, b_hit FROM p_board ORDER BY b_no DESC)) b JOIN b_Word w ON b.b_no=w.sa_no WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
